DocAttribute.Name: MainPlaneAngle
DocAttribute.Documentation: The main plane angle (A, B or C angles, according to the light distribution curve chosen).

DocAttribute.Name: SecondaryPlaneAngle
DocAttribute.Documentation:
The list of secondary plane angles (the α, β or γ angles) according to the light distribution curve chosen.
> NOTE  The _SecondaryPlaneAngle_ and _LuminousIntensity_ lists are corresponding lists.

DocAttribute.Name: LuminousIntensity
DocAttribute.Documentation: The luminous intensity distribution measure for this pair of main and secondary plane angles according to the light distribution curve chosen.
